Uses of Package
com.mgnt.lifecycle.management

  • Packages that use com.mgnt.lifecycle.management 
    Package Description
    com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner
    This package contains infrastructure that can run user implemented Task classes in a separate thread at configured time interval.
  • Classes in com.mgnt.lifecycle.management used by com.mgnt.lifecycle.management.backgroundrunner 
    Class and Description
    BaseEntity
    This is the base class for any set of classes that self-insert themselves into a Factory upon instantiation The way it works that a user will need to create an Interface and an abstract class implementing this Interface.
    BaseEntityFactory
    This is the parent factory class for all the factories.
